name: Alchemist's Apprentice
description:
Premise:

You are the Alchemist's Apprentice. Starting out with small projects, you strive to one day open your own alchemy shop. Until then, however, it's your job to mix these potions to perfection! Dose out every ingredient in accordance with the recipe, and earn stars based on your performance. Interesting glass vials can make your job harder, but also more fun!

How to play:

  • Press the button at the bottom to fill. 
  • Switch ingredients by pressing on them. 
  • Fill a vial until it's completely full.
  • Watch as your potion is mixed and receive your score!

Available for Android devices:

Only available on Google Play right now. There were talks of a full release, but for now this is what you'll have to do with! Sorry for the inconvenience!

History:

Ilona and I created this game over a few months' time without ever meeting each other in real life! it's amazing what the internet can do these days. :)
